meanings.sent1: The little tree withstood the strong wind.
meanings.sent2: The old house withstood the test of time.
meanings.sent3: The superhero withstood the villain's powerful attack.
meanings.sent4: Her determination withstood all obstacles in her path.
meanings.sent5: The fortress withstood the enemy's siege, remaining unscathed.

meanings.definition: To stand or hold out against
meanings.sent1: The brave knight withstood the dragon's fiery breath.
meanings.sent2: The dam withstood the pressure of the rising river.
meanings.sent3: The little boat withstood the stormy waves with ease.
meanings.sent4: His resolve withstood the temptation to give up.
meanings.sent5: The shield withstood the enemy's relentless attacks, never faltering.

meanings.definition: To remain undamaged or unaffected by
meanings.sent1: Her friendship withstood the test of distance and time.
meanings.sent2: The ancient ruins withstood the harsh desert climate.
meanings.sent3: The magical amulet withstood all attempts to break its power.
meanings.sent4: His principles withstood the corrupting influence of power.
meanings.sent5: The bond between them withstood all challenges, growing stronger with each trial.
